select pf.id, pf.client_id, c.name as clientName, c.email as clientEmail, pf.fund_id, f.name as fundName, f.b_fund_category as bFundCategory, f.b_project_duration_month as bProjectDurationMonth, pf.unit_certificate_date, pf.purchase_amount, pf.current_return, pf.dividend_amount, pf.dividend_cycle, pf.created_at, pf.updated_at, pf.unit_certi, pf.entity_name, pf.address_line, pf.suburb, pf.state, pf.postcode, pf.country, pf.investment_entity_id, pf.uc_no, pf.purchase_end_date, f.b_yearly_return_rate as bYearlyReturnRate, f.end_date as endDate, f.settlement_date as settlementDate, f.interest_starts_date as interestStartDate, pf.application_form_signed,pf.application_form_signed_two, pf.application_form_signed_three, pf.application_form_signed_four, pf.transaction_date,ie.entity_name as entityName, ie.email_list as emailList, ie.bhg_id as bhgId, f.default_start_date as defaultStartDate, f.b_delayed_growth_rate as bDelayedGrowthRate, f.created_at as fundCreateAt, f.extend_start_date as extendStartDate, f.default_start_date as defaultStartDate, ie.withheld_tax as withheldTax, ie.bsb, ie.account_number accountNumber, ie.account_name accountName from purchased_funds pf left join clients c on pf.client_id = c.id left join funds f on pf.fund_id = f.id left join investment_entities ie on pf.investment_entity_id = ie.id where
pf.client_id = #{request.clientId} and
pf.fund_id = #{request.fundId} and
pf.investment_entity_id = #{request.entityId} and
f.b_fund_category = #{request.fundCategory} and
pf.id in
#{id}
and
f.name ilike '%'||#{request.fundName}||'%' and
ie.entity_name ilike '%'||#{request.entityName}||'%' and
ie.bhg_id ilike '%'||#{request.bhgId}||'%' and
c.name ilike '%'||#{request.clientName}||'%' and
pf.del_flag = false and ie.del_flag = false and c.del_flag = false order by pf.id desc

select pf.id, pf.client_id, c.name as clientName, c.email as clientEmail, pf.fund_id, f.name as fundName, f.b_fund_category as bFundCategory, f.b_project_duration_month as bProjectDurationMonth, pf.unit_certificate_date, pf.purchase_amount, pf.current_return, pf.dividend_amount, pf.dividend_cycle, pf.created_at, pf.updated_at, pf.entity_name, ie.entity_name as investmentEntityName, pf.unit_certi, pf.investment_entity_id, f.b_yearly_return_rate as bYearlyReturnRate,
f.settlement_date as settlementDate, f.interest_starts_date as interestStartDate, pf.purchase_end_date, pf.transaction_date, pf.application_form_signed, pf.application_form_signed_two, pf.application_form_signed_three, pf.application_form_signed_four, pf.uc_no, pf.address_line, pf.suburb, pf.state, pf.postcode, f.end_date as endDate, f.default_start_date as defaultStartDate, f.b_delayed_growth_rate as bDelayedGrowthRate, f.created_at as fundCreateAt from purchased_funds pf left join clients c on pf.client_id = c.id left join funds f on pf.fund_id = f.id left join investment_entities ie on pf.investment_entity_id = ie.id where pf.id = #{id} and pf.del_flag = false

select pf.id, pf.client_id, c.name as clientName, pf.fund_id, f.name as fundName, f.b_fund_category as bFundCategory, f.b_project_duration_month as bProjectDurationMonth, pf.unit_certificate_date, pf.purchase_amount, pf.current_return, pf.dividend_amount, pf.dividend_cycle, pf.created_at, pf.updated_at, pf.unit_certi, pf.entity_name, pf.address_line, pf.suburb, pf.state, pf.postcode, pf.country, pf.investment_entity_id, pf.uc_no, f.b_yearly_return_rate as bYearlyReturnRate, f.end_date as endDate, f.settlement_date as settlementDate, f.interest_starts_date as interestStartDate, pf.purchase_end_date, pf.transaction_date, pf.application_form_signed, f.default_start_date as defaultStartDate, f.b_delayed_growth_rate as bDelayedGrowthRate, f.created_at as fundCreateAt from purchased_funds pf left join clients c on pf.client_id = c.id left join funds f on pf.fund_id = f.id left join investment_entities ie on ie.id = pf.investment_entity_id where
pf.client_id in
#{clientId}
and
pf.investment_entity_id in
#{entityId}
and
pf.fund_id = #{fundId} and pf.del_flag = false order by pf.id

select pf.id, pf.client_id, pf.fund_id, f.name as fundName, f.b_fund_category as bFundCategory, f.b_project_duration_month as bProjectDurationMonth, pf.unit_certificate_date, pf.purchase_amount, pf.current_return, pf.dividend_amount, pf.dividend_cycle, pf.created_at, pf.updated_at, pf.unit_certi, pf.entity_name, pf.address_line, pf.suburb, pf.state, pf.postcode, pf.country, pf.investment_entity_id, pf.uc_no, f.b_yearly_return_rate as bYearlyReturnRate, f.end_date as endDate, f.settlement_date as settlementDate, f.interest_starts_date as interestStartDate, pf.purchase_end_date, pf.transaction_date, pf.application_form_signed, pf.application_form_signed_two, pf.application_form_signed_three, pf.application_form_signed_four, f.default_start_date as defaultStartDate, f.b_delayed_growth_rate as bDelayedGrowthRate, f.created_at as fundCreateAt from purchased_funds pf left join funds f on pf.fund_id = f.id where pf.client_id = #{clientId} and pf.del_flag = false and f.del_flag = false order by pf.id

select pf.fund_id fundId, f.name fundName, c.name clientName, ie.entity_name entityName, ie.bhg_id bhgId, pf.client_id clientId, pf.investment_entity_id entityId,
count(pf.id) as recordCount, array_agg(pf.id) pfId from purchased_funds pf inner join funds f on pf.fund_id = f.id inner join investment_entities ie on pf.investment_entity_id = ie.id inner join clients c on pf.client_id = c.id
and pf.fund_id = #{fundId}
and pf.client_id = #{clientId}
and pf.investment_entity_id = #{investmentEntityId}
and f.name ilike '%'||#{fundName}||'%'
and ie.entity_name ilike '%'||#{entityName}||'%'
and ie.bhg_id ilike '%'||#{bhgId}||'%'
and c.name ilike '%'||#{clientName}||'%'
and pf.del_flag = false and pf.purchase_amount is not null and pf.unit_certificate_date is not null and c.del_flag = false
group by pf.fund_id, pf.investment_entity_id, pf.client_id, f.name , c.name , ie.entity_name ,ie.bhg_id order by max(pf.created_at) desc

select count(1) from (select count(1) from purchased_funds pf inner join funds f on pf.fund_id = f.id inner join investment_entities ie on pf.investment_entity_id = ie.id inner join clients c on pf.client_id = c.id
and pf.del_flag = false and pf.purchase_amount is not null and pf.unit_certificate_date is not null
group by pf.fund_id, pf.investment_entity_id, pf.client_id order by max(pf.id) desc) temp
select id from funds where del_flag = false and popular > 0 order by created_at desc limit 6;
